name: csv-upload-file-nodejs
description:
CSV Upload File which built using Nodejs, Ejs , CSS , JavaScript.It is responsive across all devices.

## Features - User can upload any csv file into the system - using Multer JS - Display a list of all uploaded csv files - CSV is parsed and converted into JSON and stored in the Mongo Database - When the user selects a file, it displays all the data (with column headers) in a table on the page (front end) - There is a search box which searches on the front end itself and displays the matching rows of the table only (empty search box displays all the data). - There is a sorting button (ascending and descending) for each column on the front end - There is a validation on the front end and server side on being able to upload only csv type of files - There is a pagination of the data displayed in the table to a max of 100 records per page
